#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
typedef long long ll;
char ar[100005];
ll at[100005];
	ll ap[500005];
int main()
{
	ll t,n,i;
	ll bias=300000;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
			memset(at,0,sizeof(at));
				memset(ap,0,sizeof(ap));
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		scanf("%s",ar);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(ar[i]=='a')
			at[i]=2;
			else if(ar[i]=='b')
			at[i]=-3;
			else
			at[i]=0;
		}
		ll ans=0;
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		at[i]=at[i]+at[i-1];
		ap[bias]=1;
		ll c=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			ans=ans+ap[bias+at[i]];
			ap[bias+at[i]]++;
			if(ar[i]=='c')
			{
				c++;
				ans=ans-c;
			}
			else
			c=0;
			
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
